content:
Block vote 1 can be found on Jira and the issues are listed here for your convenience. The vote for this block will happen at the Patient Care WG call on February 15 at 5 pm ET.

Issue Submitter Proposed Resolution
FHIR-34684 Various IPA typos Craig Newman Persuasive
FHIR-34715 Remove Table of Contents from menu bar Eric Haas Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34716 fix section numbering Eric Haas Persuasive
FHIR-34718 What is the official HL7 sanctioned expectation Eric Haas Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34719 Clarify write expectations Eric Haas Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34721 "See: the RESTful API" --> "See: the FHIR RESTful API" Eric Haas Persuasive
FHIR-34722 Explain Profile Support Eric Haas Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34730 Update guidance for unauthorized requests Eric Haas Persuasive
FHIR-34733 Provide adequate justification for synchronization or remove page Eric Haas Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34734 Clarify what is meant by "resource ids" Eric Haas Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34735 GET [url]/XX?[params] to GET [url]/[Resource]?[params] Eric Haas Persuasive
FHIR-34737 Remove external links to FHIRpath and SQL Eric Haas Persuasive
FHIR-34739 Change authoredOn element properties to min = 0 Eric Haas Persuasive
FHIR-34839 Sentence is not clear Ricardo Quintano Persuasive
FHIR-34841 CapabilityStatement.imports or instantiates? Ricardo Quintano Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34842 Typo clinical_status Ricardo Quintano Persuasive
FHIR-34844 Type "perrmission" Ricardo Quintano Persuasive
FHIR-34847 Wording: precise that only authorized applications get access to patient records Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34848 Typo: add "to" Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34850 Typo: its instead of it's Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34851 Typo: "Jurisdications" Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34852 Suggestion to refer to FHIR RESTful operations defintion Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34853 Clarification about "self-link of the search" Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34855 Typo: they instead of the Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34865 Wording: Redundancy of "full/fully" Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34867 Typo: principle instead of principal Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34871 Typos in profile parameter of IPAFetchDocumentReference Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive
FHIR-34872 Typo: duplicated "the" Ricardo Quintano Persuasive
FHIR-34873 Typos in IPA-Condition resource profile Olivia Bellamou-Huet Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-34911 Typo: ur Ricardo Quintano Persuasive
FHIR-35015 Type in docref Operation John D'Amore Persuasive
FHIR-35226 Typos Virginia Lorenzi Persuasive
FHIR-35227 Typo - missing a word Virginia Lorenzi Persuasive
FHIR-35232 Typo: Match verb forms Virginia Lorenzi Persuasive
FHIR-35336 Typo in “standalone” Josh Mandel Persuasive
FHIR-35339 Fix capitalization of SMART Josh Mandel Persuasive
FHIR-35343 Clarify launch/patient expectations in server obligations Josh Mandel Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-35345 Remove note about SMART configuration changing for authenticated clients Josh Mandel Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-35346 Clarify “patient identity check” langauge Josh Mandel Persuasive
FHIR-35347 Typos in fetching.html Josh Mandel Persuasive
FHIR-35349 Clarify syntax in required search parameter table Josh Mandel Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-35352 Medications should be coded at these semantic clinical drug level when possible Josh Mandel Persuasive
FHIR-35354 Link to FHIR Core Vital Signs profile Josh Mandel Persuasive with Modification
FHIR-35829 Clarify that servers need not generate documents at the time of $docref invocation Spencer LaGesse Persuasive
who are the individuals who submitted these? Are there any additional individuals that should be notified due to a request for inperson?
Can we please remove FHIR-35348 from the block?
I'm seeing some things that are typos proposed for block vote. Anything that's a true Technical Correction doesn't need to be voted at all...
@John Moehrke There is a submitter column right there, is it not visible? Maybe make it the first column?
@Josh Mandel FHIR-35348 has been pulled. Since you requested in-person reconciliation, are you available for one of the regular phone calls on Wednesdays at 9 Central?
For FHIR-35343 I added a comment on the proposed resolution. If you can make this tweak I am happy to keep this in the block vote. Otherwise I would like to remove this from the block.
For FHIR-35345 I am satisfied with the resolution but would (as I indicated in my comment) still like to understand the use case, because this is a pretty surprising behavior for me.

For FHIR-35343 I added a comment on the proposed resolution. If you can make this tweak I am happy to keep this in the block vote. Otherwise I would like to remove this from the block.

Change made

Let me know when

Next call is on February 16.
Great! I'll aim to join next week.
